events.name: COVID-19 WHO Pandemic Declaration
events.description: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 a global pandemic, marking a historic moment in public health response to the coronavirus outbreak that began in Wuhan, China.

events.name: SpaceX Crew Dragon Demo-2 Launch
events.description: SpaceX successfully launches NASA astronauts Doug Hurley and Bob Behnken to the International Space Station, marking the first crewed spaceflight from American soil since 2011.

events.name: George Floyd Protests Begin
events.description: Massive protests against police brutality and racial injustice begin in Minneapolis following the death of George Floyd, sparking a global movement for civil rights and police reform.
